channel.title: Netlify on Anything Data
channel.description: Recent content in Netlify on Anything Data

item.title: On Relocating to Github/Netlify
item.description: Deep, labored breathing Hello everyone, this is the opening post on my new blog, which I’m relocating from Wordpress to GitHub Pages and Netlify. It’s so nice I’ve given it a name - because nice things have names! But, why was I panting? The relocation effort wasn’t easy. Why did I follow through with it? Becuase it is worth the effort. This post is evidence of my victory. Now please, let me explain.
